actions.committee: Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: Senate Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to repeal the requirement of section 3306 of title 5, United States Code, relating to apportionment of appointments in the civil service in the District of Columbia among the States.

summary.text: Eliminates the requirement of apportionment among the States of appointments in the Federal civil service in the District of Columbia. (Repeals 5 U.S.C. 3306)

titles.title: A bill to repeal the requirement of section 3306 of title 5, United States Code, relating to apportionment of appointments in the civil service in the District of Columbia among the States.
